title: Rifle Pro - MoCap Pack
description: High-quality rifle and idle animations with seamless transitions for Unreal Engine. Enhance combat realism.
longDescription:
Rifle Pro - Animation Pack


The Rifle Pro - Animation Pack by Mocap Online offers 390 high-quality rifle animations, 48 aim offsets, and 36 split jumps for Unreal Engine. Designed for seamless motion transitions and enhanced realism, this pack is perfect for developers seeking realistic 3D character animations.

Explore the full animation list and view animations in our animation viewer.


Animation Highlights:

  • Aiming & Shooting: Aim offsets and shooting animations for realistic combat.
  • Movement: Idle, walk, jog, run, and crouch animations for smooth character movement.
  • Combat Transitions: Holstering, reloading, and weapon swaps.
  • Jumps & Deaths: Jump animations and various death sequences.


Seamless Integration:

Pose-matched animations ensure fluid transitions between idle stances, actions, and combat scenarios. Suitable for characters with gun-drawn or gun-down positions.

  • Effortless Retargeting: Quick transfer to UE5.xx Manny with modified IK-Retargeters. Download the Retargeting Project.


About Mocap Online Mocap Online provides high-quality motion capture animations, specializing in realistic 3D character animations for various applications, including films and virtual reality. Our packs, such as Ninja Starter and Rifle/Shooter, deliver top-tier animation assets.

Explore more on our website, view the animation list, and check out our animation viewer.


Additional Resources:

  • Watch the Rifle Retargeting Video: Rifle Retargeting
  • Download the Retargeting Project ZIP: Download Here

Updates:

  • Latest Update (REV. 2.7B): Enhanced "ik_hand_gun" IK socket animation to match "middle_01_r" FK socket animation. Updated split jumps with improved take-offs, in-air loops, and landings.
technicalDetails:
For Retargeting to UE 5.xx Manny - Please use our retargeting tools - DOWNLOAD HERE:

  • https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/13tMjMKd2HCFrQUp4Ep9YaI4KaVGIAyRl?usp=sharing


REV. 2.7B

  • "ik_hand_gun" IK socket animation now matches "middle_01_r" FK socket animation.

REV. 2.7A2

Lowered Crouch Turns

Stabilized Aim Turn Loops

REV. 2.7A1

  • 2.7A1 has All New Updated Split Jumps. Improved Take-Offs, In-Air Loops and Landings.
  • Naming corrections.
  • "A" Reference Pose.
  • Engine 4.14 - 5.xx Compatible
  • For Engine 4.13 and Previous - All FBX Source animation files are included and can be imported into older versions including IPC curves.

2.7A

  • New Socket on the "middle_01_r" for attaching the Rifle.

Our IPC(in-place custom) animations have custom attributes with Speed and Rot(yaw) data curves.

○ New Weapon Holsters - On Back and Pistol Swaps

○ Back Rifle Socket and Hip Pistol Socket with matching animations.

○ Animation List has frame/seconds delay timings for Holster/UnHolster.

○ Holstered Animations match our Mobility Pro and Pistol Pro, for integration with our other Animation Packs.

● Root Motion and In-Place.

● FBX source files in “\Project\Source\FBX\” as a ZIP file.

releaseInfo.releaseNote: Include "Source" folder in package, please. IK anim fixes.
